text.section: The Executive Director shall settle, compromise, or defend claims against the Fund.

Notwithstanding § 9-602 of the Criminal Law Article, the Executive Director may authorize an employee of the Fund to record a telephone conversation with a policyholder, witness, claimant, investigating officer, or other interested party if:
the conversation is relevant to an accident or claim;
the party to be recorded has or might have information that is relevant to the accident or claim; and
before recording, the party to be recorded is advised of and consents to the recording.
